data.meta_description:
The Biggest Team in Belgium

Like Last year, we're taking the same time of year, the same motivated colleagues😉😉😉 the  same winter weather...❄️❄️❄️ and we…
data.text: 🌈 You can be yourself at bpostgroup At the beginning of this month, which bears the colours of the rainbow, Anette Bohm, Chief Human Resources Officer at bpostgroup, explains what #Diversity and #Inclusion mean: “Diversity is reflected in our 35,000 employees, with more than 100 different nationalities, who bring millions of people together every day. We offer high-quality employment in an inclusive work environment. You can be yourself and fulfil your potential, because it is talent that makes a difference. To create an inclusive culture, everyone must feel they are being supported, listened to and inspired to be the best they can be.” It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from and what your abilities are. At bpostgroup, you can be yourself and develop your talents. #wearebpostgroup
